data.name: World of Warships — Oktyabrskaya Revolutsiya
data.detailed_description:
Easier to command than she is to pronounce, this battleship doesn’t beat about the bush—big guns, rock-solid armor, good survivability. ‘Nough said.

Key features:

  • Fast Damage Control Team consumable available
  • Great damage per salvo
  • High level of protection against HE shells.

This package includes:

  • Oktyabrskaya Revolutsiya, Soviet Tier V battleship
  • Victory Day permanent camouflage
  • Port slot

Permanent camouflages only change the ship exterior and do not provide any economic or combat bonuses.

If you already have this ship in your Port, you will receive 3,030 doubloons as compensation.

data.supported_languages:
English*, French*, German*, Czech, Japanese*, Polish*, Russian*, Thai, Turkish, Spanish - Spain*, Korean*, Portuguese - Brazil*, Traditional Chinese*, Italian*, Simplified Chinese*, Ukrainian, Dutch*, Spanish - Latin America*
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 x64 SP1
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo 2.66 GHz, Core i3 2.5 GHz, AMD Athlon II X2 2.7 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GT 440/630, AMD Radeon HD 7660
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 62 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 11
  • Additional Notes: 1280×720
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 x64 SP1 / 8.1 / 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 3.4 GHz, AMD FX 6350 3.9 GHz
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 660, AMD Radeon R9 270x
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 65 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 11.1
  • Additional Notes: 1920×1080
